#if($doc.syntaxId=='xwiki/1.0'){{html wiki="false"}}#end$doc.display('editor')#if($doc.syntaxId=='xwiki/1.0'){{/html}}#end
$doc.display('usertype')
#set($isMyProfile = ($doc.fullName == $context.user.substring($i)) && ($context.action == "view")) #if(($isMyProfile || $xwiki.hasAdminRights()) && !$doc.getObject("XWiki.LDAPProfileClass"))
